articles.description: Says morale is high despite lingering heartache, praises Babar Azam for his handling of the team.
articles.content:
Pakistans Iftikhar Ahmed admitted on Wednesday his side were heartbroken and still hurting from their agonising opening defeat to arch-rivals India at the Twenty20 World Cup.
An epic 82 not out from… [+1811 chars]
